thread.title: Southampton flyovers to close for roadworks
thread.title_full: Southampton flyovers to close for roadworks

title: Southampton flyovers to close for roadworks
text:
Drivers in Southampton could face delays over the next three days as two busy sections of road are closed for maintenance work. 
The A33 will be closed tonight and tomorrow at the Redbridge flyover eastbound between 8pm and 5.30am. Share article 
Then on Tuesday and Wednesday nights the Millbrook flyover will be closed between the same times. 
Alternate routes will be put in place through Millbrook roundabout and Redbridge roundabout while the overnight work takes place.
